item.title: Hashing It Out #56 – Mattereum – Vinay Gupta
item.dc:creator: Corey Petty
item.description: This episode, Corey brings on Vinay Gupta from the Mattereum project. This was spawned from a tweet thread from Vinay about people and their stuff that excited Corey, and the following conversation does not dissapoint. Today, we dive into the fundamentals about the transaction costs associated with the lifecycle management of physical goods. What does […]

item.title: Hashing It Out #55 â€“ Diligence – Steve Marx
item.dc:creator: Corey Petty
item.description: Today’s episode brings on Steve Marx from ConsenSys Diligence. Steve only talks with Corey this episode as Collin has to move across the states. Together, they chat about the what the “Diligence” section of ConsenSys is, how it got started, and where it’s going. From there, Corey and Steve discuss the very concept of security […]
